translations: v．妨碍，拖累：使某人或某事受到阻碍或负担。
· The heavy backpack was encumbering the hiker.
沉重的背包拖累了徒步旅行者。

sentences.sentence: This, in turn, was due to a tradition of including GUI design and other encumbering design issues in those specifications.
sentences.translation: 反过来，这归因于在那些规范中加入 GUI 设计和其他阻碍设计的问题的传统。

sentences.sentence: Books on this subject illustrate many effective releases from grips around the waist, under the arms, and other encumbering holds.
sentences.translation: 格斗方面的书籍例举了很多从抱腰、臂下抱腰、以及其它擒抱中解脱出来的有效方法。

sentences.sentence: Buying homemade products and making local purchasing will set fresh barriers to international trade with the result of encumbering global economic recovery.
sentences.translation: 购买国货及当地采购政策，将为国际贸易设置新的壁垒，阻碍全球经济复苏。
